++ Horticulture Seed Germination



+++ SUMMARY

  * Determine whether stratification is needed, desired (e.g. evergreens):
    * https://morningchores.com/seed-stratification/
  
    * Standard Stratification Proces:
      * Soak in water 24 hours.
      * Place in temperature of 40F or above for ~60 days. 
      * Seed is now ready to sow.
